product_name: White Sierra Kool Brim Hat - Special Buy
long_description: When traveling or camping in hot, sunny and buggy regions, wear the White Sierra Kool Brim Hat. It's got great ventilation to keep you cool, and Insect Shield(R) to repel pesky biters. 100% soft peached nylon wicks moisture away, dries fast and offers UVA/UVB protection; the hat is very flexible and packs easily. Ventilating mesh buttons on the crown let excess heat escape. Insect Shield fabric repels mosquitoes (including those carrying West Nile virus and malaria), ticks, ants, flies, chiggers and midges or no-see-ums. Insect Shield uses permethrin which is a man-made version of a natural insect repellent found in a type of chrysanthemum plant; it's odorless and invisible. Snaps let you raise the brim on one or both sides. White Sierra Kool Brim Hat has an adjustable crown cord and chin strap, and stays on in the wind. Special buy.
short_description: When traveling or camping in hot, sunny and buggy regions, wear the White Sierra Kool Brim Hat. It's got great ventilation to keep you cool, and Insect Shield(R) to repel pesky biters.
